author: Ken Moritsugu
title: China moves to block new virus flare-up on Russian border
description: BEIJING (AP) — China is facing a new coronavirus flare-up along its remote northern border with Russia, far from the epicenter of Wuhan, where it has all but declared victory in the battle against...
content:
BEIJING (AP) China is facing a new coronavirus flare-up along its remote northern border with Russia, far from the epicenter of Wuhan, where it has all but declared victory in the battle against the pandemic. 
The frontier has been sealed and emergency medic… [+4301 chars]
